Text.Page:
Do you love it here? I love it here. I hope I can stay here always!

Oh, you want something to do? Okay, well you can kill some Tenebrara {@LinkCreature:36#8#enforcers}, {@LinkCreature:36#9#assassins}, and {@LinkCreature:36#10#priests} if you want a job. That'd be good.

Talk to Vyrnna in Tor Exsul when you're done.
You need to kill more enemies first.
